events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, involving damage to the front bumper and hood.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the nature of the damage reported on the customer's car.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and customer communication promptly.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps in the process.
Request sent for photos of the damaged vehicle and a copy of the police report to assist with claim investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including photos of the car damage and official police report.
Claim investigation has commenced to verify details of the collision and assess liability and damages.
Investigation finalized with confirmation that the damage aligns with reported accident circumstances.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the repair costs based on the damage assessment.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely processing of the claim.
Claim approved officially authorizing payment to the repair shop as per agreed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued and sent directly to the authorized vehicle repair provider.
The claim has been closed successfully after confirmation that the vehicle repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived according to company policy for future reference.
